DOC.brief_title: Custom Molded Foot Orthoses Effect Foot Kinematics Lower Extremity Electromyography During Walking Running .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must complaints low extremity foot pain nontraumatic , mechanical origin . Subjects must least 60 degree frontal plane forefoot rearfoot passive range motion ( determine modify Gib test symptomatic low extremity . Subjects must able walk independently treadmill speed 4.8 kmh . Subjects must refer health care professional orthosis fitting .
